resources.string: Welcome to the Stool Parasite Detector!

This App allows the user to submit images taken with a microscope, in order to detect the presence of parasites in human stool samples. This App is intended to help pharmacists and student in this type of analysis.
Are you ready? Tap the \"START\" button to begin!

You have 2 options: you can either take a picture with your Camera, or you can upload one from your Camera Roll. The choice is yours! 


BUT REMEMBER: your picture has to meet certain specifications in order to be correctly analysed by the algorithm.

This App makes use of a machine learning algorithm to automatically detect parasites in stool samples. 

The App requires a .jpg image taken at 40x, which is sent to the algorithm in order to be meticulously analysed and processed. If everything goes according to plan, you will see the same picture displayed, but with annotations surrounding the microorganisms which were found by the algorithm. 

After that, the annotated image will be saved to a database for research purposes, and you can also save it to your Camera Roll!

This App, with the use of machine learning technology, can detect up to 10 different species of parasites that are occasionally present in human stool (tap on any of them to see detailed information about the parasite):
